songs.title: Used to Love Her
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
I used to love her
But I had to kill her
I used to love her
But I had to kill her
I had to put her
Six feet under
And I can still hear her complain

[Verse 1]
I used to love her
But I had to kill her
I used to love her
But I had to kill her
I knew I would miss her
So I had to keep her
She's buried right
In my backyard

[Verse 2]
I used to love her
But I had to kill her
I used to love her
But I had to kill her
She bitched so much
She drove me nuts
And now I am happier this way
Oh oh yeah
Take it for
What it is

[Chorus]
I used to love her
But I had to kill her
I used to love her
But I had to kill her
I had to put her
Six feet under
And I can still hear her complain
